casebody.data:
Omar Y. LOPEZ, Appellant,
v.
Michael GARRETT, Respondent. ED 107220 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, NORTHERN DIVISION. Filed: April 30, 2019
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied June 4, 2019
Application for Transfer Denied September 3, 2019 Daniel Ray Dunham, Dunham Legal, P.O. Box 1085, 838C Grand Avenue, Hannibal, MO 63401, for appellant. Michael Garrett, Respondent Acting Pro Se. Before Lisa P. Page, C.J., Lawrence E. Mooney, J., and Robert M. Clayton III, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

Omar Y. Lopez ("Lopez") appeals the judgment of the trial court following a trial de novo on his small claims petition against Michael Garrett ("Garrett"). The trial court entered judgment in favor of Garrett. We affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order. The judgment is affirmed pursuant to Rule 84.16(b).
